ptserver.test.junit

Class ServletTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptserver.test.junit.ServletTest

  • public class ServletTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test the ability to open, start, stop, and close a simulation request on the Ptolemy server using the Hessian protocol.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Peter Foldes
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (pdf)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (pdf)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.ResourceBundle CONFIG
      Access the ResourceBundle containing configuration parameters.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServletTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeSimulation()
      Test the ability to close an existing simulation request and to ensure that the simulation is removed from the server.
      void openSimulation()
      Test the ability to create a new simulation request and to ensure that a non-null ticket is returned, the returned ticket has an id, the number of simulations stored has increased by one, and the simulation is in Idle state.
      void pauseAndResumeSimulation()
      Test the ability to pause and resume a newly created and started simulation request and to ensure that the state of the execution changed to paused and back.
      void setUp()
      Set up the initial singleton reference and Hessian proxy factory that will be used within the JUnit test cases.
      void shutdown()
      Call the shutdown() method on the singleton and destroy all references to it.
      void startSimulation()
      Test the ability to start a newly created simulation request and to ensure that the state of the execution changed to preinitialize and iterating.
      void stopSimulation()
      Test the ability to stop an already iterating simulation request and to ensure that the state of the execution changed to idle.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • CONFIG

        public static final java.util.ResourceBundle CONFIG
        Access the ResourceBundle containing configuration parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServletTest

        public ServletTest()

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Set up the initial singleton reference and Hessian proxy factory that will be used within the JUnit test cases.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an error creating the Hessian proxy.

      • openSimulation

        public void openSimulation()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Test the ability to create a new simulation request and to ensure that a non-null ticket is returned, the returned ticket has an id, the number of simulations stored has increased by one, and the simulation is in Idle state.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an problem opening the model URL or communicating with the command servlet.

      • startSimulation

        public void startSimulation()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Test the ability to start a newly created simulation request and to ensure that the state of the execution changed to preinitialize and iterating.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an problem opening the model URL, starting the simulation, or communicating with the command servlet.

      • pauseAndResumeSimulation

        public void pauseAndResumeSimulation()
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Test the ability to pause and resume a newly created and started simulation request and to ensure that the state of the execution changed to paused and back. This test can fail if the execution cannot pause. For example, some models using the PN director cannot get into the paused state.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an problem opening the model URL, starting, pausing, or resuming the simulation, or communicating with the command servlet.

      • stopSimulation

        public void stopSimulation()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Test the ability to stop an already iterating simulation request and to ensure that the state of the execution changed to idle.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an problem opening the model URL, starting the simulation, stopping it, or communicating with the command servlet.

      • closeSimulation

        public void closeSimulation()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Test the ability to close an existing simulation request and to ensure that the simulation is removed from the server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an problem opening the model URL, starting the simulation, closing it, or communicating with the command servlet.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Call the shutdown() method on the singleton and destroy all references to it.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there was an error shutting down the broker or servlet.
